name: Trevor versus Pigeons
description:
Trevor versus Pigeons

Trevor wants to see how many pigeons he can hit in his fall from a skyscraper.

CONTROLS: Left mouse button
RESTART: F5
QUIT: Escape

Trevor versus Pigeons was made in roughly one hour as a part of challenge.

*This is the official page for this title. Anywhere else where this title appears to be available is unofficial and I cannot guarantee that it is safe to download*.
